name: Spirit of Omen: Pyro Scorpion
description:
When the character to which this is attached takes DMG: If possible, lose 1 Energy to negate 1 DMG, and then create a Scorpion Blessing. (Max twice per Round).
Technique: Burning Assault
Usage(s): 1
